verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H3605"\w* end. \w A|strong="H1696"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* heavens shew forth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* firmament declareth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* work \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hands.
Day \w to|strong="H3068"\w* day uttereth speech, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* night \w to|strong="H3068"\w* night sheweth knowledge.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* speeches \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* languages, where \w their|strong="H3068"\w* voices \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3467"\w* heard.
Their sound hath gone forth into all \w the|strong="H4194"\w* earth: \w and|strong="H4194"\w* their words unto \w the|strong="H4194"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w the|strong="H4194"\w* world.

\w He|strong="H4194"\w* hath \w set|strong="H5437"\w* \w his|strong="H5437"\w* tabernacle \w in|strong="H7585"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* sun: \w and|strong="H5437"\w* \w he|strong="H4194"\w*, \w as|strong="H7585"\w* \w a|strong="H5437"\w* bridegroom coming out \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w his|strong="H5437"\w* bride chamber, Hath rejoiced \w as|strong="H7585"\w* \w a|strong="H5437"\w* giant \w to|strong="H5437"\w* run \w the|strong="H5437"\w* way:

\w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* end \w of|strong="H0430"\w* heaven, \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* circuit even \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* end thereof: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w can|strong="H0935"\w* hide \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heat.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* law \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0776"\w* unspotted, converting souls: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* testimony \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0776"\w* faithful, giving wisdom \w to|strong="H0776"\w* little ones.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* justices \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H6310"\w* right, rejoicing hearts: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0639"\w* lightsome, enlightening \w the|strong="H4480"\w* eyes.

\w The|strong="H8478"\w* fear \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* Lord is holy, enduring \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H8064"\w* ever: \w the|strong="H8478"\w* judgments \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H8064"\w* true, justified \w in|strong="H8064"\w* themselves.

\w More|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* be desired \w than|strong="H5921"\w* gold \w and|strong="H3742"\w* many precious stones: \w and|strong="H3742"\w* sweeter \w than|strong="H5921"\w* honey \w and|strong="H3742"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* honeycomb.

\w For|strong="H4325"\w* thy servant keepeth \w them|strong="H7896"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H4325"\w* keeping \w them|strong="H7896"\w* there \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H7896"\w* great reward.
Who can understand sins? \w from|strong="H0784"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* secret ones cleanse \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, O Lord:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* those \w of|strong="H3068"\w* others spare thy servant. If \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* dominion \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* without spot: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* cleansed \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* greatest sin.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* words \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* mouth shall be such as may please: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* meditation \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* heart always \w in|strong="H7971"\w* thy sight. O Lord, \w my|strong="H7971"\w* helper, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* redeemer.
